block_types.description: An unsettling work of art is visible beneath the patina of many hands passing over this wall.
A padded strip of carpet covers the hardwood floor, and strange stains cover the carpet. Try not to step on them.
A door, practically invisible beneath somewhat contradictary stickers endorsing 'Y Combinator' and 'Kill All Techies'.

content.introduction:
You awaken in a converted hotel above a laundromat. You are likely to be eaten by a grue.
A plain white ceiling is above you.
It's a narrow hallway. Doors line either side of the hall down to a corner in the distance. You can see some plain, some luridly decorated, but none are open. The light flickers overhead. How did you get here?
You hear a shuffling around the corner and sit up. Why does your head hurt so much?
 Please play the game. You can only play the game once in a lifetime. This is an irreplaceable opportunity.

INSTRUCTIONS FOR THE GAME:
you do not know the rules of the game
you do not know the stakes of the game
you do not know the objective of the game
you do not know who controls the game
you do not know how to end the game
You start with 100 points.
Begin.
